acceptance_criteria.routing_value_present: Agreement >= 0.70; model demonstrates ability to classify ITF designs with same or higher precision than Google Fonts.
acceptance_criteria.routing_value_absent: Agreement < 0.60; model fails to generalize to non-Google specimens or exhibits bias toward Google Fonts training data.

risk_controls.metadata_consistency: Use Fontshare's official classification where possible.
risk_controls.licensing: ITF Free fonts only; ensure specimen legality.
risk_controls.source_drift: Validate that Fontshare CDN links are stable for specimen rendering.
